text: The 1983 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship was a series of motorcycle speedway races with all participants under the age of 21. The title was won by Steve Baker of Australia. ==European final== *July 24, 1983 * Lonigo, Pista Speedway ==See also== 1983 Individual Speedway Junior Individual Speedway Junior Category:Speedway competitions in Italy
title: 1983 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
